name: Scrub Bubs Australian Hand and Body Cream
description:
Pamper yourself with our Australian Body Cream and nourish your skin. Our innovative Skin and Body Care Range with its Australian Extracts and Australian Essential Oils delivers incredible properties to your skin. Our Australian Body Cream has unique ingredients kakadu plum, aloe vera, quandong berry, cocoa butter, lemon myrtle, Australian lavender, apricot kernel oil.  Gently massage into skin after a bath and use as a hand cream for throughout the day.

All Scrub Bub products are handmade in Kangaroo Valley NSW with gentle love and care!

name: Scrub Bubs Australian Story for Mum
description:
This set of 3 beautiful products is all naturally derived from mother nature with Australian Botanicals infused into them.  These botanicals deliver enriching properties to the skin.

Australian Body Scrub; Australian Body Wash and Australian Body Cream make the perfect gift for all our mums!!

All Scrub Bub products are handmade in Kangaroo Valley NSW with gentle love and care!

name: Scrub Bubs Baby Botty Balm
description:
Enjoy this gentle botty balm naturally derived from mother nature with Australian Botanicals infused in it....The perfect gift to welcome and congratulate!

Apply on those tender spots due to nappy rash; dry skin and chaffing – our botty balm is perfect for all over your cherubs body not just the botty.  With gentle ingredients of extra virgin olive oil, cocoa butter, castor oil, macadamia oil, certified organic beeswax infused with Australian Lavender and Chamomile.

All Scrub Bub products are handmade in Kangaroo Valley NSW with gentle love and care!

name: Scrub Bubs Baby Bath
description:
Enjoy this gentle bath blend naturally derived from mother nature with Australian Botanicals infused in it....The perfect gift to welcome and congratulate!


To help soothe, calm and relax add a dash of our bath oil to gently cleanse baby’s sensitive skin. With purified water, olive oil, coconut oil, grapeseed oil, and a drop of tenderness with Australian Lavender Essential oil and Australian Mandarin Essential Oil simply stir the water to help infuse and relax.

All Scrub Bub products are handmade in Kangaroo Valley NSW with gentle love and care!

name: Scrub Bubs Baby Massage
description:
Naturally Derived from Mother Nature with Australian Botanicals infused into this gentle product.  The perfect gift to welcome and congratulate!

Lightly massage your baby with our gentle massage oil.  This will nourish the skin with its gentle blend of sweet almond oil, macadamia oil, evening primrose oil, vitamin E oil and a drop of tenderness with Australian Lavender Essential oil and Australian Mandarin Essential Oil. 

All Scrub Bub products are handmade in Kangaroo Valley NSW with gentle love and care!
